item.title: Infection Spread
item.description: 2020 has been a wild year. COVID 19 has everyone reeling, trying to figure out what this means for us. So many conversations and initiatives surround the idea of trying to “flatten the curve.” Some obsessively check the CDC update of the number of cases in their home country or use percents of those infected to convince themselves this isn’t that bad. I am no expert on infections, but I also have been thinking about the impact of COVID 19 recently.
